overview:
Kirk Vorsatz has been instrumental in placing software engineers at over 300 technology companies here in Silicon Valley. These companies range from household names like Oracle (including Siebel Systems, Peoplesoft, and BEA Systems), Salesforce, Success Factors, Netsuite, Demandtec, Guidewire as well as several early stage start up development teams. KirkSearch is a 3rd party recruiting resource for FULLTIME DIRECT HIRE placement that utilizes a small but lethal recruiting network here locally. Kirk has over 17 years of technical recruiting experience and 9 years running his own boutique recruiting firm for building Enterprise Software teams. Kirk won multiple “Recruiter of the Year” awards at Silicon Valley’s #1 Recruiting firm, Hall Kinion, as well as was the 1st eligible Pinnacle Society member during his employment there. Hall Kinion was acquired by KForce, a $1B contract staffing firm, in November of 2003.

Feel free to contact Kirk directly at either 650-245-7043 or kirk@kirksearch.com
